title: Interactive Multimedia Distance Education for Advanced Microbiology Concept Comprehension

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic microbiology terminology and fundamental concepts of biological phenomena
context.additional_context: Visualizing advanced microbiology concepts through interactive multimedia learning on smartphones, with project-based assessments measuring learning outcomes.

learning_goals: Learners can explain complex bacterial genetic processes through animations and audio explanations
Learners accurately understand over 80% of core microbiology concepts using an interactive self-assessment system
Learners can analyze real-world microbiology cases and write reports using a PBL (Problem-Based Learning) approach

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
